data.text:
@GTDRockyPodcast That said, I don’t think the original Rocky theme was revenge, but about proving yourself TO yourself.

In III, Adrian tells Rocky if he wants to fight, he should do it for the right reason.

Not for the title, not for money, not for her.

She says he should do it for himself.
@GTDRockyPodcast In Rocky III, Apollo tells Rocky to remember what Clubber Lang did to him last time.
